fields.name: We contextually apply best practices to optimize for performance.
fields.value:
Palatial methodically goes through a scene to merge and instance meshes, de-duplicate assets, and replace incompatible materials with placeholders that can be easily fixed in Unreal Engine.

Lights are exposure adjusted and attenuated to reduce complexity, or replaced with proxy lights depending on user settings. Nanite and LODs will also be set up across the scene.

The result is a project that runs at >30fps on a web browser, is visually faithful to the original model, and is easily editable in Unreal Engine.

embeds.title: For more info, check out our deep dive on Palatial's optimization approach.

thread_name: How is geometry, materials and lighting optimized?
